attributes.action: Review Policy with Regard Social Housing and Affordable Housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Telford and wrekin alone has
5287 live applications on the housing register.

44,000 applications by property type

16000 claiming housing benefit.

Only 130 Houses of Shared ownerhip.

Affordable houses are not monitored to ensure they are sold to key workers and in Telford and Wrekin alone are well above the affordability factor identified of £80k.

Policy with regards the building and supply of Social Housing is in need of urgent review.

Affordable housing needs to be monitored and be affordable according to regional and local affordabilty rates.

Residents need to be involved in planning applications from the early stages and not when the decision has been made.
